description: The Institutions of Eminence (IoE) Scheme provides financial grants to selected higher education institutions to achieve world-class status. The scheme aims to enhance research, innovation, and academic excellence in Indian universities and colleges.
key_features: Grants for selected higher education institutions
Implemented by the Ministry of Education

benefits.grant_amount: Up to Rs. 1,000 Crores over 5 years for public institutions
benefits.coverage: Infrastructure, research facilities, faculty development, and academic programs

education_criteria: Must be selected as an Institution of Eminence by the Empowered Expert Committee
additional_criteria: Institution must have a plan to achieve top global rankings
institution_criteria: Institutions designated as IoE by the Ministry of Education

eligible_courses_delhi: Not applicable (scheme supports institutional development, not specific courses)

steps: Institutions apply through the Ministry of Education
Submit detailed proposal for IoE status
Evaluation by the Empowered Expert Committee
application_process.note: Application as per Ministry of Education notifications

required_documents.note: Detailed plan for achieving global rankings

special_notes: Scheme supports institutions, not individual students
Private institutions receive regulatory autonomy instead of grants
Aimed at achieving top 100 global rankings
